alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:13PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Broward and south central Palm Beach Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 613 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Loxahatchee NWR, or 17 miles northwest of Coral Springs, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Coral Springs, Wellington, Parkland, Loxahatchee NWR, Godfrey Road and Ramblewood East. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Broward County
